attributes.action: Publicly identify and issue ASBOs to people who buy from SPAM emails/calls/messages.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
In tandem with the SPAM-slap petition I'd like to tackle the demand side too.  If no one *bought* from SPAMmers then SPAM would stop.

Given the dubious nature of what much SPAM peddles, public exposure of the fools who buy such tat might be an effective deterrent.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
